name: Vultorch
desc: Real-time CUDA tensor visualization with Vulkan zero-copy. GPU→GPU blit with zero memcpy via shared memory.
descZh: 基于Vulkan零拷贝的CUDA张量实时可视化工具。通过共享显存实现GPU→GPU直传，完全消除内存拷贝。
detail: Real-time CUDA tensor visualization with Vulkan zero-copy. show() does GPU→GPU blit; create_tensor() eliminates memcpy entirely via shared memory. Built-in ImGui, 3D scene view, docking layout.
detailZh: 基于Vulkan零拷贝的CUDA张量实时可视化工具。show() 实现GPU→GPU直传；create_tensor() 通过共享显存完全消除内存拷贝。内置ImGui、3D场景视图与可拖拽窗口布局。

name: InfEngine
desc: Research-oriented game engine built on Vulkan + C++17 with Python scripting via pybind11. RenderGraph pipeline, ECS architecture.
descZh: 面向科研的游戏引擎，基于Vulkan + C++17构建，通过pybind11提供Python脚本层。RenderGraph渲染管线、ECS架构。
detail: A research-oriented game engine built on Vulkan + C++17 with a full Python scripting layer via pybind11. Features RenderGraph-based pipeline, ECS architecture, and modular design for graphics research and indie development.
detailZh: 面向科研的游戏引擎，基于Vulkan + C++17构建，通过pybind11提供完整Python脚本层。采用RenderGraph渲染管线、ECS架构，模块化设计兼顾图形学研究与独立开发。

name: Ailurus OS
desc: Local-first AI desktop workbench. Electron shell + React/Vite UI + Python Flask agent runtime with a pluggable app ecosystem.
descZh: 本地优先的AI桌面工作台。Electron桌面壳 + React/Vite界面 + Python Flask智能体运行时，支持插件化应用生态。
detail: Local-first AI desktop workbench (codename: Machiavelli) — a lightweight "desktop OS" experience. Electron desktop shell handles windows, tray & dialogs; React + Vite drives the renderer UI; Python Flask powers the local AI/Agent runtime and tool orchestration. Apps are pluggable sub-applications under apps/, each with its own frontend, Python backend, and capability manifest (ailurus.json). Supports LLM-based agent routing, one-click dev setup, and .ail package distribution.
detailZh: 本地优先的AI桌面工作台（代号：Machiavelli）——轻量级“桌面操作系统”体验。Electron负责桌面壳与系统集成（窗口、托盘、对话框）；React + Vite驱动渲染界面；Python Flask提供本地AI/Agent运行时与工具编排。应用为可插拔子程序，每个应用包含前端、Python后端和能力清单（ailurus.json）。支持基于LLM的智能体路由调度、一键开发环境搭建，以及.ail格式的应用包分发。

name: EmbodiChain
desc: End-to-end GPU-accelerated Embodied AI framework by DexForce. I built the OptiX 8 real-time ray tracing renderer.
descZh: 跨维科技端到端GPU加速具身智能框架。我负责基于OptiX 8的实时光追渲染模块。
detail: End-to-end GPU-accelerated Embodied AI framework by DexForce. I built the OptiX 8 real-time ray tracing renderer — multi-camera parallel pipeline on warp-lang, plus HPC module architecture design.
detailZh: 跨维科技端到端GPU加速具身智能框架。我负责基于OptiX 8的实时光追渲染模块——基于warp-lang的多相机并行渲染管线与HPC模块架构设计。
role: OptiX 8 RT renderer & HPC module architecture
roleZh: OptiX 8 光追渲染器 & HPC模块架构
